sentences.en: Bad Moon warriors wear strikingly patterned clothing and shocking war paint designed to terrify the enemy.
sentences.cn: 恶月的战士们喜欢用夸张的装束和吓人的战漆来恐吓敌人.

sentences.en: Don't let the title of Kelly's book terrify you.
sentences.cn: 不要被凯利的著作的名称吓到.

sentences.en: Driving at high speeds in the median of a highway to terrify drivers in both lanes.
sentences.cn: 在马路中间高速行驶以使双标的目的行驶的司机都受到惊吓.
丈夫的暴力行为让她感到害怕。

sentences.en: Low - flying aircraft terrify wild animals.
sentences.cn: 低飞的飞行器令野生动物惊恐.

sentences.en: NIV Would not his splendor terrify you? Would not the dread of him fall on you?
sentences.cn: 11[和合]他的尊荣,岂不叫你们8惧怕吗? 他的9惊吓,岂不临到你们 吗 ?

sentences.en: Now, it's the thoughts in our head that terrify us the most.
sentences.cn: 现在, 令我们感到最害怕的,是我们自己头脑中的想法.

sentences.en: Remove Your hand from me, And let not the dread of You terrify me.
sentences.cn: 伯13:21就是把你的手缩回、远离我身.又不使你的惊惶威吓我.

sentences.en: So no fear of me can terrify you, Nor can my pressure be heavy upon you.
sentences.cn: 7我的威吓不能使你惊惶, 我的压力在你身上也不会沉重.

sentences.en: So pursue them with Your tempest And terrify them with Your storm.
sentences.cn: 诗83:15求你也照样用狂风追赶他们、用暴雨恐吓他们.

sentences.en: That I may not seem as if I would terrify you by letters.
sentences.cn: 9我说这话免得你们以为我写信是要威吓你们.

sentences.en: Their movements through the region were calculated to terrify landowners into abandoning their holdings.
sentences.cn: 他们在该地区的行动是精心谋划的，意在恐吓土地所有者放弃手中的地产。

sentences.en: Whom would it profit to terrify or to kill James Sinclair?
sentences.cn: 恐吓或者干掉詹姆斯·辛克莱对谁会有好处？

sentences.en: Will not His majesty terrify you, And the dread of Him fall on you?
sentences.cn: 伯13:11他的尊荣、不叫你们惧怕麽.的惊吓、不临到你们 麽 .

sentences.en: Would not his splendor terrify you? Would not the dread of him fall on you?
sentences.cn: 11他的尊荣岂不叫你们惧怕吗? 他的惊吓岂不临到你们 吗 ?

sentences.en: You'll terrify me out of my wits if you behave in this way.

words.tran_cn: 极好的；极其的，非常的；可怕的
令人恐惧的；骇人的；极大的
恐怖；恐怖行动；恐怖时期；可怕的人
使恐惧；恐吓（terrify的过去分词）
使害怕，使恐怖（terrify的现在分词）

trans.tran_cn: 使恐怖，使惊吓，恐吓，吓唬，威胁
